name: All Star Quarterback 19
description:
Lead your team to glory in the ultimate football simulation! Can you handle the pressure?

LIVE THE QUARTERBACK DREAM

Live your dream as the quarterback in the big leagues, call the shots with real-time game reporting and decisions that define your career. From the personal relationships to the career success, you can have it all.

TAKE TOTAL CONTROL

Handle relationships with your coach, agent, fans and more. Train, learn playbooks and earn trades to new teams. Follow the twists and turns of a full career that is built around the way you play.

LIVE THE HIGHS AND LOWS

All Star Quarterback 19 is tricked-out with plenty to do to live the football lifestyle. Check your lifestyle screen to see if things are going track, date a girlfriend, take part in pre-game meetings and post-game press conferences.

THE QB LIFE:
• True Football Simulation
• Game-changing and career defining decisions
• Impress coach, sponsors and media
• Buy real estate, cars, clothes and jets
• Be the star of the show

JOIN THE FULL FAT COMMUNITY

Follow: Instagram.com/fullfatgames
Follow: twitter.com/fullfatgames
Subscribe: youtube.com/fullfatgames
